event.title: High Quality Curtain Wall Profiles  Montanstahl brings over 30 numerous
event.description:
Over the last decades, stainless steel has been recognized as a convenient high-end material and started to be a dominant design feature in an increasing lots of façade and curtain wall structure projects.


The Glass Façade – the Eye-Catcher
Façades are often the company card of a setting up. The lobby gives an initial message of prestige to help its visitors when going into the building. Therefore, it can be no surprise that designers and designers accurately pick and define materials to get these areas. More plus much more of them turn to metal for their curtain outlet projects.



High Quality Curtain Wall Profiles
Montanstahl brings over 30 numerous industry experience and excellence in the production and supply of high-quality special shapes in steel and s / s. Our laser welded curtain wall sections differ noticeably from conventional fillet-welded divisions.

The laser weld seam is small, neat and scarcely noticeable. Montanstahl usually manufactures it is laser profiles by welding mutually high precision laser-cut toned bars and occasionally the steel profiles are build way up using press brake pieces, hot rolled or extruded special shapes.



The Right Solution for a Prestigious Curtain Wall Façade
In a steel-glass curtain wall, the mullions and transoms have to grant sufficient strength compliment the load of this façade. The weight with the glass panels and the resistance from the wind load assure that. The more glass and less mullions contrators work with, the more majestic along with transparent the façade will certainly result.

Extruded aluminum profiles include the most common material to get curtain walls. However, it isn’t strong enough for like high span facades. Right here the preferred choice plainly becomes mild steel, on account of its three times higher e-modulus as well as for more prestigious applications steel. Laser Welded and Distinct Edge Curtain Wall Parts
Montanstahl laser welded drape wall sections are custom-made. Structural men with vision can specify the bigger, height as well as the web and flange thicknesses in line with the static requirements.

Additionally , they calibrate the weld penetration precisely, according to the structural load requirements on the curtain wall and lessening distortion and stress.

It is also possible to combine numerous material grades, so called black and white combinations, where some parts are usually in mild steel and other parts in stainless steel. This all results in a wide matrix of solutions that givetotal layout freedom to architects and also engineers.

Another plus could be the sharp contour of the shape that generates a highly accurate cut between light along with shadow. Architects appreciate this completely.



Stainless Steel Curtain Outlet Profiles
The majority of curtain wall mullions and transoms are intended with a sideline of 50 or 60 millimeters. The particular depth, or height from the sections, results from the structural requirements with the façade. The taller the façade the harder the depth of this section and/or steel masses included in the flanges.

The most favored mullion and transom designs utilized in steel-glass curtain walls are generally rectangular hollow sections (RHS) and stainless steel tees.
